unnormalised: Bore, tor tum Govt. office-ak zaito adres sodta, kiteak? Mhaka te kashtta gotha! Bharotantle sorkari sanstha ani veg-vegle ofishial imaroti sodpacho adres ek khara khazinyacho shod lagtalea bhaxen dista, haina? Khas korun tumchea lagim kitlek sodchea vishayan ek dhomdi suchona astana.
normalised: Boro, tor tumchea Tea Sarkari office-achea barabor address sodunk jatan, hã? Mhaka khobor asa ti kashtam! Bharatantlea sarkari sansthanchea ani veg-veglea odhikrut imaratinchea thikanni mellovop ek boreach khajinacho sod soddlea bhaxen dista, sô? Khas korun tumchea dollean ek dhundhuk idea astana kiteak sodunk zata mhonn.

unnormalised: Poile, postal system azun legit asa mhonn ugddas thev! Tor, thik pin code zanno khub mhotvacho, khas korun Dilli vo Mumbai sarke phollun asa tachea shaharanim. Tumak fottich ek landmark vaprun utrun vochnak mellonk xakta zori tum khara bhagevant ani postman-ak area zanno asa. Te ghoddnen, "AIIMS lagim, Dilli" adresacho ek bhag mhonn legit kamak yetalem. Punn sadharanponnan, sodanch pin code mellunk prayatn kor.
normalised: Poilem mhunnttlear, yaad dovrat post office system azun asa! Tori, ekdom nixtt pin code mahit asop ekdom mhotvachem, khas korun Delhi vo Mumbai bhaxen vostarlilea xehrant. Tumkam ek nisonn vaprunk melltta zô tum bhagivont assa ani postmanak to watto boro zanno asa tor. Tea parim, "A-I-I-M-S lagim, Delhi" address-acho ek bhag mhunn kamak yetta. Punn sadaronnponnim, sodanch pin code mellovpak prayatn kara.

unnormalised: Anik ek vostu ji hanvem lokshan ditelia? Puranne ani nove nanna vaparpacho. Udharonnak, mhaka ugddas asa hanvem Chennai-nt hea eka sorkari office-ak sodunk prayatn kelia. Dislem ki, online diilelo adres azun legit rastyachem purannem nann vapurn asa! Tor, sodanch Google Maps-ak te jagek cross-reference kor vo tancheam lagim pusta zatat te lagchea manishteacho.
normalised: Ani ek vostu mhaka disli? Zumneam ani novea navancho vapar. Udaharonnak, mhaka Chennai-nt eka sarkari office-ache sod gheupachi yaad asa. Dhaktto uttor, online diistt zalolea address-an azun zumneachem nav vapartale! Tori, sadanch google map-acher location cross reference kora vo sthanik lokank vichara tumka zatat tor.

unnormalised: Ani magir assat te akxaranchi sankxipt rup! "Sector 15, Noida, UP" sadem dista, haina? Punn kiteak tori, sorkari kagdapatranim "Uttar Pradesh"ak fakt "U.P." mhonn vo even "UP" mhonn sankxipt kortale. Tenne tum bhonvronk xakta. Hea chotte chotte asangatponancher ek nodar thev. Titlem-i nakki kor ki tumka imaroticho ank korrekt mellunk. "Bldg. No. 10" "Bldg. 10A" peksa sampurnn vegllok asta.
normalised: Ani magnni asat! "Sector pandhra, Noida, U-P" sompem dista, sô? Punn kednam-kednam, sarkari kagdak patram "Uttar Pradesh"-ak fakt "U-P" vo "U-P" mhunn choloitat. Tem tumkam bhair uddounk zata. Tantunt thode sangtincher lokxe divot ravonk zata. Ani imaratichem number barabor assa mhunn chit di. "Imaratichem number dha" "Imaratichem dha A" poros puro zata.

unnormalised: Landmark-anche shaktek khall kor naka. Zori tumka thik rastyancho ank mellonk xakta naki, "Opp. State Bank of India, MG Road, Bangalore" tumchea lagim puskarnachea durek vochnak puro asta. Odik bore zaitelea zannvak asa telea jageacho ullek koronk zaitalo, mhonnlear "Near India Gate, New Delhi, 110001".
normalised: Nisonnakai unni mahati divonk namaka. Zô tumkam ekdom ghora number mellonk na, "State Bank of India samkhim, M-G Road, Bangalore" tumkam disachea dikhkak sodunk puro zatat. Tovuy borem tum ekdom zanno asli zaga dakoitolim, "India Gate lagim, Navi Delhi, ek xembhar ani dha hajar ani ek".

unnormalised: Oh, ani ek dhaktto utar RTO address-ancher. Te badnam assat! Te sadyan ek khasa dhongaracho palan kortale, kade kade gunthguillacho. Udharonnak, "RTO Office, Zone IV, Andheri (W), Mumbai - 400053" ek chalti asa. Nakki kor ki tum Zone ank samil kortat. Te mhotvache asa.
normalised: Oh, ani ek turant utor R-T-O address-anche vixim. Te prasidd asa! Te sadaronnponnim ek tharavichem, kednam-kednam kallok korta te parim choloitat. Udaharonnak, "R-T-O Office, Zone chár, Andheri (W), Mumbai - chár xembhar hajar ani teppann" ekdom sadharonnponnim asa. Chit di zone number mellovpak. Tem mhotvachem.

unnormalised: Mulbutponnan, Bharatantlea sorkari address-anchem shod ek kala asa. Punn thoddea dhirajim, thoddea lagchea zannananim, ani ek sampurnn dobble-checkinganim, tum thain yetele! Tujea shodan lagtea boreborem!
normalised: Sadaronnponnim, Bharatant sarkari address mellovop ek kala rup asa. Punn thode thirpon, sthanik zannam ani veg-veglea checkam-xim, tum te zagear pavtole! Borem tumchea sodacher!
